title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Skills: Remix-Based Creativity Assessment: Language Education Media Production Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can reinterpret existing language education media content using remix techniques to create new educational materials.
Learners can independently perform the planning-production-evaluation process of media creation projects using only smartphone-based tools.
Learners can improve their creative media production competencies through peer assessment and self-reflection.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
